message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This price reflects the product's value and still gives you a good deal. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Can you meet me there?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I'm happy to negotiate, $9,500 is still quite a bit below what the product is worth. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. This is a fair price that takes into account both our perspectives.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement on this offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,800. Can you consider this price?
